record.description: A proposed moderation action (e.g. adding a label or annotation to a post). Refers to some other resource via URI (e.g. an atproto post). Superset of 'com.atproto.proposal.defs#label.

ver.description: The AT Protocol version of the proposal object.

typ.description: The type of moderation action being proposed. Currently expected values are 'allowed_user' or 'label'

src.description: DID of the actor who created this proposal.

uri.description: AT URI of the record, repository (account), or other resource that this proposal applies to.

cid.description: Optionally, CID specifying the specific version of 'uri' resource this proposal applies to.

val.description: For 'label' proposals, the short string name of the value of the proposed label.

note.description: For 'label' proposals where 'val' is 'needs-context', the full text of any proposed annotation (e.g. community note) to be shown below the post.

reasons.description: An optional array of predefined reasons justifying the moderation action.

aid.description: The persistent, anonymous identifier for the user creating the proposal.

cts.description: Timestamp when this proposal was created.
